title: Corporate lobbyist would be least likely to

content.question: A corporate lobbyist would be LEAST likely to have an informal discussion about a pending policy matter with which of the following?

choices.label: A member of the House in whose district the corporation has a plant
A member of the White House staff concerned about the issue
A member of the staff of the Senate committee handling a matter of concern to the corporation
A federal judge in whose court a case important to the corporation is being heard
A journalist for a major newspaper concerned about the issue

content.answer: A federal judge in whose court a case important to the corporation is being heard

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply to different scenarios in context.
